website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its solid build and quality materials, this popular phone ring is one of the most durable you can purchase.
pros: Made entirely from zinc alloy and stainless steel for a sturdy feel
Buyers appreciate how the ring swivels for holding and viewing at multiple angles
Includes a ring hook mount for car, but the ring itself is able to stick to a magnetized car mount
cons: A little too big for some customers' fingers
Can cause trouble for customers with wireless cell charging

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work with wireless charger unless you place it very low on phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and look of this ring stand. But please be aware that if you have a wireless charger for your phone it will not charge unless you put it on the very bottom or top of your phone. I had to take it off and put it back on 3 times before the wireless charger would work correctly. Luckily, they give you several 3M sticky pads so I had enough but it did slightly mar the surface of my phone case. I think it’s because it’s metal and not plastic like the Popsocket I used before. Looks Great though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Makeupcat

customer_reviews.title: Not as thin as it looks in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product, and very sturdy. My only complaint was it's not as thin as it looks in the picture so I couldn't use it for what I needed for. Update: A representative for the company reached out to me to send me another "thinner" version. Which turned out to be the same exact one I already had. But just the fact they wanted to make me happy meant a lot. If anything I would buy from this company just because they actually tried to make me a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn in any direction. Inaccurately advertised
customer_reviews.text: This ring holder was advertised as turning in any orientation. In fact, it is even listed on the product’s box. However, it is stationary. It You cannot rotate the ring to face in different directions, such as if you want to be able to sit your phone up vertically and then turn the ring so perch it horizontally or turn it to use it with both your left and right hands. This holder once adhered will only open and close in one direction, truly limiting its functionality. A version of this ring holder that I ordered two years ago turned, but the one I was sent does not.
customer_reviews.author: QuietOwl

customer_reviews.title: Bought one; it died; was sent a replacement lightning-fast
customer_reviews.text: Customer service for this item was exemplary. After about six months, my ring stopped working--the spring lost tension. I wrote them, they wrote back within just a couple of hours, politely asked for two photos of my ring but with a "no questions asked" feeling--they just wanted to see how it had failed, and then within 3 business days I got the new one in the mail. I love this little ring. The ring works with a magnetic phone mount. I bought a magnetic thingy for my car and so my phone snaps on easily and comes off when I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu McByron

customer_reviews.title: More secure with gripping issues!
customer_reviews.text: With rheumatoid disease in my hands I don't trust myself with the pop out type. I drop things too easily. This style with the ring is much more secure for me to keep my phone from being dropped so much. It really sticks well. This is my 2nd one, the first one I actually used so long I wore the finish off. So when I got a new cover I opted for a new one. But I kept the old one as a back up. For the price it sure is worth every penny! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renee' M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago. It came with two adhesive pads, but I'm still on the first one. I use it every day, and it has saved me from dropping my phone so many times. It's way smaller than a pop socket, and it's easier to hold your phone with. It's also a great kickstand. It is slim, but it still prevents you from setting the phone completely flat. For that reason, I put it on my phone case, and if I need my phone to be flat, I just take the case off. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok....  update: much better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and style. The ring is awkward to hold. The metal for the magnet must be thin, it doesn’t stick well. The ring part is plastic. The edge of the metal is a little sharp Update 6/12/20 The company personally emailed me. They offered to send the new style for free. The new style is much thinner. It sticks much better to my magnetic holder. The edges are still slightly sharp but much better. I do like this holder especially as a phone stand and prop.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the rose gold color and the sleek look of this ring holder. It sticks very well to my phone case. With my previous Hummix ring holder, the ring spun while the center remained immovable on the phone, but on this new Hummix ring holder, the center + ring holder move together (I preferred the previous one, but I've gotten used to this new one). It does seem like maybe the rose gold color will fade away sometime in the future, it has faded a tiny bit already, but only in one tiny spot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L C

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ring!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ring about two years ago. I really liked it but mistakenly thought all rings had this quality. Boy, was I wrong! Two rings later and I’m back! This is what I like: it’s sturdy. Once it’s on, you won’t feel insecure about it falling off. It’s flat. I can put the phone down on my desk and click around on the screen and my phone won’t wobble. It stays propped up. I love that it moves around 360 degrees! Lastly, it’s a good looking ring and that doesn’t change much with time. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The pin holding the finger ring onto the piece that is attached to the phone ended up coming loose and eventually the ring fell off completely, I couldn't even clamp the pin back inside, due to the threading of the pin (which is what should have been holding it in. Guess it lasted a few months, though I expected much more from a full metal phone ring. This review is being written many months after the product broke. Edit: Changing from 3 to 5 stars because customer support contacted me to offer a replacement for free. If you are worried about having to buy a new one after a few months, this is definitely the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Unroosed

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone ring holder. It's very well made and allows me to angle my phone horizontally while attached to my magnetic phone holder in my car. The customer service is great as well. After registering for the warranty they contacted me to verify my info to send me a free gift! Very pleased with this purchase and would definitely recommend that anyone looking for a well made, sturdy phone ring holder purchase a Humixx product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: great product! no fears of dropping my phone!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ring it makes it much easier to hold my phone and not worry about dropping it! Magnet is super strong and holds to my car holder. Recommended this to some friends and coworkers who have had other brands and like mine much better! I put this directly on my case however they do give you a plastic sticker if you choose to put it on your phone. I am not sure if it would leave a mark as i have not taken mine off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, easy to use, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It is a nice small size so it doesn't cover up the pretty design much on my phone case. It works well for selfies and holding the phone, propping it up. The ring rotates so it's easy to use in a number of positions, however, there is some resistance when turning the ring so it doesn't just slip and swing all over the place. It looks slightly less rosy/pink than the photo and has a more copper/rose tint to the rose gold but it's still really pretty. Looks high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa A.

customer_reviews.title: This is the ring you have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Lasted almost a year before my abuse caught up to it and wore out the screw where it henges. Still had to pry with a paint scraper to remove from my phone case. Just ordered a replacement. Good product. Excellent adhesive and honestly I can’t wait for my replacement to get here because I’ve come so accustomed to using it to securely hold my iPhone xmax that I’m lost without it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: New version breaks
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned this ring on my last phone. New one is a different design and broke after one week of use. Not happy at all. Update: customer service contacted me and sent me one of the older models to make this up to me. I appreciate the good customer service! Please discontinue the new version and stick to the classic design!
customer_reviews.author: Denzel Smallsware

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and intelligent design
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. It is sturdy and holds up my heavy phone. I bought rose gold, but knowing already that time will probably make this beautiful color peel someday. I also worry that one day the swivel ring will be too weak to hold itself up. It rotates 360 degrees and is very useful. 5/5 all around for now! For the price, I will buy again if anything happens. They also sent extra adhesion in case the stickiness wears off, and a sticker to put between the phone case and the ring! Several extra stickers and stickies.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Surprised to see how good it is!
customer_reviews.text: I dint expect much from this... and ordered this cause my Spigen kickstand broke. But was pleasantly surprised to see it was very sturdy, stays put, and its not at all bulky! Plus you can rotate it too, to change viewing angles. The only problem... i accidentally ordered a Gold instead of black :( and returning it costs as much as the holder itself!
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashri

customer_reviews.title: This finger ring is great!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at what seemed to be hundreds of finger rings before I found this one, and it's perfect!!! I love the rose color; the ring doesn't spin, so I can't fidget with it; it's nice and tight, so it stands up my phone without letting it fall; and it helps me hang onto my phone so I don't drop it. I've had it now for several months and it's still the same color, and it's still nice and tight. And for the price, it can't be beat! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but after a few months of daily use it broke and I had to buy a traditional pop socket. I went through two of these before I gave up. Update: People from Humixx have reached out to me many times asking me to delete this review in exchange for yet another ring or any other products they sell, they’ve even offered me a full refund plus extra money. I don’t need this since I rightfully paid for and used the product, but I will leave this review to show the lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again, but doesn't look like I'll need to.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a sticky plastic piece to attach to your phone to protect it from the actual holder, which didnt stick well. I have an otterbox on my phone and the protection sheet didnt stick well, so I just stuck the ring right to my case and its holding strong. The ring itself is still sturdy, not floppy. It's not as flat as I'd hoped, and it took a bit of getting used to. Overall, it's pretty awesome. Might be a one time buy for mu current phone at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The pin which connects the ring and the base fell out after one month of usage. -------update-------- good customer service. I got a free replacement, although it's not covered by warranty. I will update review in another few months depends on the quality of the new one. -------update-------- after few months of using, the replacement works well. bump it up to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Su35

customer_reviews.title: phone ring - pretty, but
customer_reviews.text: Nice ring as horizontal stand and to hold but... Wish had a flat edge, with this ring on back of my phone case I find it makes my pH too THICK to fit securely in my car holder. Also with very smooth, slick finish the ring makes phone slippery when laid flat. If this was a bit thinner, had a slight rubberized finish and a flat side (hexagon, otagon?) would have been better for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Savadian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the last ring that lasted for 1-2 years , this ring only stayed on for a couple weeks and now falls off constantly. Not the metal ring but the clear adhesive circle that is between the phone and the ring. I’ll go buy the same ring I had before this one.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Piggy

customer_reviews.title: Great at First, Then .... Update
customer_reviews.text: Update -- Humixx reached out after my original review and send a replacement. This is great customer service. We have used the replacement for a week now and no issues. Original Review -- The device is very useful and for the first month worked great. The phone would stay in any position that you placed it, but after a month of normal use, it just folds back into the phone. Now the phone will not stand and the device is useless....
customer_reviews.author: jasonfire

customer_reviews.title: Too small but it seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall ring stand is too small in my opinion. Just a little bigger than a quarter. The magnet is a great idea but since it’s small it couldn’t handle the weight of my phone. Once I hit a bump it slides off. Only had it for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold but scratched up easily. The shine wore off quickly, within a months use. The ring can not be used as a stand, it swivels which is good for holding, but after a while it gets so loose that it’s not good for anything but holding. Pretty color, but cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ribali

customer_reviews.title: Returned for false info in listing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exact product for about five years. Only used three in that time. And that was because one was new to a new phone. I LOVED the ability to turn the ring 360*. It made it so very handy. The one I’ve been using since 01/2019 finally broke so I ordered a new one along with a new case. I just opened it and it in fact does NOT fully rotate. I’ll be sending it back. The listing as well as the description tote the product rotates. Do not be deceived!
customer_reviews.author: MegC

customer_reviews.title: Was great, for a couple months...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ring but, unfortunately, it didn't hold up. I purchased my second one in April. The first was on a case I stopped using so I purchased the second one for my new case. I love the color, shape, size and design of this ring. It is slightly large but I have large knuckles for a woman, so that's a plus for me. The ring no longer has any resistance to it. It just flops around. I'm very disappointed. It didn't last long!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and comfort of this Hummix ring stand for my S9+ phone. It seems to be well constructed and is relatively easy to place on phone. I do love the comfortable, rounded feel of the ring with no sharp edges to gouge my finger when using it to hold my phone securely. The ring itself rotates around to whatever angle is most comfortable for you. All in all, a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: AppleB

customer_reviews.title: Love the design & functionality
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few weeks, but so far so good. I bought another ring holder right before this, not realizing it would flip, bit not rotate. The rotate feature is crucial for how much I use my phone for work everday. So, 180 flip, 360 rotae, and magnetic - this is exactly what I was looking for! I also love that they have a rose gold color.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenny

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly simple and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love how sleek and simple this ring is. It's low profile and is a lot more comfortable than other styles of stands. The only issue I had with it is that the pin started to come out. I feel like this is because I fidget with it a lot. I contacted the seller and they sent me another one within a few days. With this second one, I covered the hole where the pin went in with epoxy and I haven't had any issues since.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best ring magnet out there
customer_reviews.text: This low profile ring/magnet is perfect for me. It's smooth, again low profile (so doesn't get snagged) and meets all my needs. I will say the sticky is not strong enough for ANY case, but most hard shell cases it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Z1815

customer_reviews.title: Dropping my phone MORE with this product attached to my phone :(
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn't had a previous ring holder that I liked (it broke after 11 months and is no longer made), I might have liked this more perhaps... This has been too slippery for me to hold on to and I've dropped my phone WAY more than ever before. I think because the material at the base (the part that sticks onto my phone) is too slick, I have a hard time just holding onto my phone in general (ex. not even by the ring). The ring itself also swivels around too loosely all around its base so I constantly have to readjust it before I can hold it comfortably. I'm removing it as soon as I find a replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie P

customer_reviews.title: Well thought and well made product
customer_reviews.text: I have used an iring, and a knockoff as well but neither of them come even close to how clutch this ring stand is. The issue with the iring is that it's very rigid when you start to use it and the knock off becomes very loose very quickly making it ineffective as a kickstand. I was kind of annoyed using this in the beginning because the ring isn't centered but I got used to it in a day. Highly recommend it. I just hope the ring doesn't get loose too soon
customer_reviews.author: Shashank Gupta

customer_reviews.title: It is still fully in tact and working wonderfully. I love the rotating option as this has ...
customer_reviews.text: This ring is just what I was looking for. I’ve been using it for about a month now and do not see any lifting up from my case. It is still fully in tact and working wonderfully. I love the rotating option as this has come in handy depending on how I’m holding my phone. I can fit two full fingers in the ring for extra support, but I have smaller fingers. The ring is also sturdy enough to prop my phone up on its side, just as described. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nehlen

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is great and the material is great as well. Unfortunately, the ring is no longer stiff and it is quite loose; it's still holding up, but it flops just a bit, not too much. I just wish it would have lasted longer. UPDATE!: They reached out to me and offered to send a new ring stand. The customer service is just amazing and they are so kind. You can tell that they care about their customers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnet and durable ring
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I bought. They work GREAT! Bought for the magnet and the ring combo. The magnet is super strong.. i just wish the ring part was a tad smaller and flat at the end but they r still great 👍.
customer_reviews.author: tami

customer_reviews.title: Great product and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful. I love it, but I'm a little concern that it may not last, but that maybe my fault. I notice that after me twirling the ring around so many time, just me playing with it, that the ring just flaps on vs locking in place. It's really not a big deal, but that kind of thing bothers you, then I dont suggest overly twirling the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda surprised by all the bad reviews. Must be a quality control issue. Mine has been fantastic for about 2 years and taken all kinds of abuse. Very comfortable and ring rotates; I wear it like a ring while driving if I need to see a map. Works fine as a kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This review is long over due. I’ve had this phone ring since January 2019 and it’s still chillinnnn. And the one before that for two and a half years! Affordable and it lasts! I have the magnetic mount in my car too which I am obsessed with. 12/10 would recommend! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanna love it but already broke - the ring won’t stand up - the circle on back is scratched and worn down to a gross silver color now - not great quality it’s only been a month Edit- Reach out to the manufacture yesterday and they are shipping out a replacement there is a warranty warranty-woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two of these now (had to replace my case). I like the way it looks (and it stays looking good) and it stays on really well. I wish it were easier to use it as a stand and it is a little strange that you have to put a clear sticker on the back of your phone case that you can still see after you put the holder on. Not a huge deal. I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: alisammeredith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, until....
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Looks great! I love that it comes with several stick pads so I can put on other cases! UPDATE: I’ve had this ring for 2 months and now it’s falling apart. It became loose a few days ago and it’s getting worse by the day. A screw is loose and I am unable to tighten it. It sucks because I really loved this ring.
customer_reviews.author: Jelynix

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely AMAZING best product on the market for this. cheap, reliable, comes with extra adhesion, great magentic quality and so so cute!! ive used it for a few months now and have even tranferred cases, absolutely ADORE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Steele

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last as long as I’d hoped but still cool
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for the first few months that I had it. Adhesive is really good, I feel confident holding my phone with it, and I like that there are a few different angles you can put your phone at on a surface (can’t get that with popsockets). But after a few months it loosened/became limp. It knocks against the back of my case, almost never supports my phone if I angle it up with the bottom on a surface. It still works if it’s angled up with the side on a surface and I can still use it as a grip. I just wish it had been sturdier for longer. Definitely a cool little tool though.
customer_reviews.author: mxb

customer_reviews.title: Works till it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: It worked well till it didn’t. I bought one, the screw that keeps it tight loosened up and I was able to exchange for a new one. Now ~2 months later same thing happened. Ring is loose and floppy and only good for helping to hold phone. Probably a matter of time before it pops off completely. Was nice and sturdy as a stand and easier to hold before became loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks! After a few months of use, it’s still shiny and new-looking. I also really like that it works for the magnetic holder in your car. The hinge is still tight and it feels really well made. My only complaint is that the ring is too big for me to get a really good grip on the back of my phone with it. The ring works great as a stand though. For one-handed phone holding, this isn’t as functional as a pop-socket (is that what they’re called?) but this ring makes up for it in style points.
customer_reviews.author: Meg R P

customer_reviews.title: Little Added Accessory
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice change from those popsockets. It was easy to put on and take off. So if you need to move it, you don’t feel like you have to wrestle it off. Plus its not as bulky as the popsockets. You can’t use it to hold your phone up tho but I don’t use my phone in that way anyways. Honestly i don’t use it very often. But when it comes to selfies and holding your phone so it doesn’t smack in the face while scroll through instagram in bed. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jess and Joe

customer_reviews.title: Short term usable stand
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this ring stand, and while initially very happy with it, the stand quit holding firm. I was VERY impressed with the customer service and received a quick replacement with no questions asked. The CS was prompt and polite. I highly recommend the product now. Do make note that if you plan to use a wireless charger, the ring must be placed up near the camera lens but it still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ring holder
customer_reviews.text: This ring holder for the back of my phone is extremely sturdy. It twists 360° allowing me to hold my larger phone at different angels. You can also used the ring to prop up the phone both horizontally and vertically on a flat surface. I also love that this folds flat against the phone and doesn't snag slipping it into a pocket in my jeans or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Great phone holder, can use it many different ways. Smooth metal feels fine, no sharp edges, no pinching my fingers. Only teeny tiny drawback is that sometimes I can’t get it to work as a kickstand in the angle I want it due to the weight of the phone. Still works better than a popsocket! Definitely my favorite phone holder ever.
customer_reviews.author: SoJo

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love this product. I would strongly suggest you attach the adhesive directly to your case IF you have a case you will end up replacing soon or a cheap case. The tape holds WAY better if you don't use that clear sticker cell phone case protector. I bought a highly rated $10 case so I didn't care if I couldn't get the sticky stuff off it. Had it this way for months now with no problems. Ring is still firm after months of use. Very please with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No one of the better rotation rings.
customer_reviews.text: The don't tell you enough about what type of products are best for the glue pad. For me my rubberized ipod case it was not a good match. Just a little pressure broke the seal . Pay a little more and get a Spigen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Paulick

customer_reviews.title: Durable product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, durable. I had 2 of another brand that broke within a month. I've had this one for 5 months and see no sign of wear. The ring is a little larger than others and I thought I wouldn't like it, but I do. I highly recommend the Humixx ring. I paid $10 for this one, well worth it especially since I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: LP@NC

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit. My initial order loosened up within 60 days. I reached out to the seller and they immediately replaced it as it was under warranty. It was very easy and quick. Great product, better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Love this ring!
customer_reviews.text: I have the bigger Iphone, so I really can't afford to NOT have a ring on the back of the phone.. This makes it so much easier to text, carry and swivel. I love this one because it lays flat, and also rotates. Some of the rings do not rotate and that is annoying. This one is true rose gold (the color of my phone) and is very pretty. I have mine on the back of my iphone case and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: KC Sheperd

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it . I can’t see my phone without it . I rather have a ring than a pop . I way much simpler and easy having a ring . Is nice that I can use the magnet to put it on my car .
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to happen to my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this ring holder. Not only is it beautiful (rose gold) but great quality and fully functioning. I’m always holding/carrying my heavy iPhone X by it. Makes my life so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomX3

customer_reviews.title: This product does not last long
customer_reviews.text: The ring it self is easy to apply. This ring will break within a few months of use. I brought one in January and had to buy a new one because it broke in May. The one I bought in May broke in July. Spend your money on a product that won’t break in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I really disliked how bulky the PopSocket was (along with some other ...
customer_reviews.text: You guys, I bought the Humixx Finger Ring Stand (in the rose gold color) after becoming fed up with my PopSocket. I really disliked how bulky the PopSocket was (along with some other faults it has), so to transition to this sleek, discreet Humid Ring has been amazing. I love the color, it is just as functional as a PopSocket (if not more so), and I've gotten so many compliments on it. I also love the little car holder thing it comes with. It is also magnetic, for those of you who already have a magnetic phone holder in your car. Couldn't be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Fuller Fam

customer_reviews.title: Study and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved using my Humixx phone ring, and usually they stick on until I get a new phone or phone case. Not the best for silicone or really flexible plastic cases. This phone ring keeps my phone safe while I'm driving and prevents wrist and thumb pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. W. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: broke after just weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: This product felt durable and strong, but after only a few weeks of use, the pin has come lose on the ring and it just flops around now and there is no way to tighten it. I would love to hear from the company about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: jljohnston22

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone ring
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3 one I've bought. The first lasted me almost a year until the ring became loose. The other 2 I bought, I still have. I've put them on 2 different phone cases because I switch out my cases. I also have a magnetic phone holder for my car vent. The magnet on both are really strong, so the phone stays in place with falling off easily. I absolutely love these rings, even my boyfriend said that he wanted one for his phone when he saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing this. Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing this. Hold nicely. Doesn't lose sturdiness quickly. Cut the clear plastic to shapeBefore positioning. Holds iPhone Up well As a stand
customer_reviews.author: Robyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Magnet needs to be stronger
customer_reviews.text: Item serves it’s purpose however for the price, the strength of the magnet Is not what I was expecting. I was expecting it to be as strong as some of the pricier magnets that come in a pack. It will not hold my iPhone EXR with a battery case
customer_reviews.author: KTShifflett

customer_reviews.title: works as it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I love that it can hold the phone (even in a wallet case) upright to watch something. The ring works like how I wanted, but I can't say whether its more stable than a button as I've never tried a button. But I like it for what it is. However its gone through a beating and the pink shimmery coloring has started to come off. I'm don't care about what it looks, but that can be a negative for some people. It still functions great, smooth turns and very flat when I need it. I wouldn't mind buying another when this one just reaches its useable life.
customer_reviews.author: Hong J Choi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It has a very low profile, which is what I was looking for. It rotates pretty easily without being too loose. It won't rotate without you turning it. The hole is a bit large though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My favorite thing is the swivel of the finger ring. I love the look and rose gold finish. I will be buying more of them for gifts this year!
customer_reviews.author: Shawntam

customer_reviews.title: Good product and Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic phone holder was perfect for my needs to use on my magnetic car mount. Feels sturdy while holding it. I used this well over a year without issue. This product lasted longer than I expected. When I did have an issue I reached out to customer service and was able to get a replacement under the generous 18 month warranty for the same item. I would have bought another one even if there wasn't a generous warranty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I liked about the Humixx finger ring was the appearance
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I liked about the Humixx finger ring was the appearance! I am not satisfied with your product at all! I was under the impression that your ring would hold my phone up right by the ring, which in no way can it happen! I would send it back for a full refund but it’s not worth the cost of S&H!!!! Will not recommend your product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Love this ring more than my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am so impressed with this company! I love this ring it as it works just as advertised. A few months ago my the pin was coming out of the ring and became very loose. I could not prop my phone up anymore. I contacted Humixx via email and they sent me a brand new one! (And it arrived quickly) Love this product and love this company!
customer_reviews.author: Kellyjo

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a iPhone stand.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Feb 4th & the ring is virtually useless as a stand to prop up the phone. It’s extremely loose and folds in when I try to stand the phone up and flops out when I’m just holding the phone. This is my 2nd one and I did not have these issues with the first one. You need a certain amount of tension to use it as a iPhone stand which I can no longer do now that it’s so floppy. ugghh & of course I cant return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Two days in, I like it the ring is a bit large. But it works. I like that it's quite thin. Fits in my wallet. Mine don't last long. Hopefully this one is different for the price
customer_reviews.author: LuvVdubbs

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, great service. Just not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like it on my iPhone 8 Plus. However, my husband did. It felt weird and uncomfortable to hold the phone with my finger through the ring. Worked great as a landscape kick stand but I never use my phone that way. Great materials and fast shipping, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: khstl24

customer_reviews.title: Magnet isn’t strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before, it lost its rose gold plating and the ring hinge got loose, but it was after a year, and overall it was fine so I bought the same one mainly because I knew it had a strong magnet. The magnet in this newer version will not hold my phone, which is a deal breaker. If you’re not looking for a magnetic mount, it’ll probably be okay for you, but if you need one your phone will become a projectile in your car with this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mugge

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Beautiful color I got the rose color ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Beautiful color I got the rose color one for my iPhone X I have a small hand and this enables me to be able to hold it securely when other holding it or doing selfies!! Btw: the clip that comes with it is an extra bonus I put it on my refrigerator so when I’m cooking I can talk to whom ever on speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: Laya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, functional, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had any similar products but I LOVE this. It looks great on my case (I got the rose gold) and is more professional looking than similar items. It works great as a kickstand and does help with holding your phone. I love that it spins 360, but it's not so loose that it just flops everywhere. It also comes with a plastic hook for your car (or wherever).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is well made however, in order to get the full benefits of the product make sure to read the instructions. Love it and will purchase more in the future :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic... until the ring comes loose.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this ring holder!! It is super easy to use and makes it so I never drop my phone which, unfortunately, I am prone to! However, about 9 months into using the product, something came loose on the ring. It no longer holds the phone up and is not stiff like it used to be. I’m a little disappointed because I expected it to last longer. While it was working, it was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Mr McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: stuck this on my phone recently and I am already very impressed with the quality and design. Because the ring can be adjusted 360 degrees, my finger can rest comfortably however I'm holding my phone -- it sounds like a small thing, but it's definitely a big deal. Way better than door-knocker style rings I've seen and tried that only flip open without an adjustable angle. Package came with simple instructions, a cleaning wipe and like ten extra stickers; good if you're switching phones or phone cases often I guess. Will update if anything changes my opinion with time and wear, but overall would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: navigating is easy when your thumb has full access to anywhere on the screen.
customer_reviews.text: The versatility if the ring is amazing. I gave this 5 starts all around but one draw back, it's not strong enough sometimes when using it as a "kick stand". Otherwise it's perfect! The adhesive disks are great, the 360° ring allows me to hang on to my phone while doing tasks with my hands..... Kinda like wearing a giant ring!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Finger Ring Stand 360 Degree Rotation
customer_reviews.text: I have never used one of these on my IPhones so this is a treat - It is really great that I can hold it by this ring and also used it to stand up a bit so I don't have to hold it all the time - Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this three times for three different phone cases and I LOVE it! I am using the Magnetic Car Phone Mount by RANVOO  In my car (which is also great!). I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Why can't I get another hook?!?
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased this product, I loved it. It came with a hook for my car and I couldn't have been happier with it. It eventually got lose and broke (twice actually). I recently wrecked my can and I need a replacement hook. I have purchased no less than 5 of these, even one that said it came with a hook in the description. I used the buy it again option to buy the exact same on I purchased the first time, but no hook. I don't want a magnet, I want a hook. Please help me find another one
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Morton

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike the look of pop sockets, so when I found this I was super excited! My fingers are small and this is perfect. It’s study and sticks to my hard plastic case. I’ve already recommended to everyone I know lol
customer_reviews.author: Alysha R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone ring but the plastic film that goes on my phone case wasn’t too sticky. It came off with my phone ring after 1 week of use. I know that the plastic film is to protect my phone case but I may use the key ring without the protective film.
customer_reviews.author: dbutler1410

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand and often falls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my sister had one and I figured they all work the same but the stand is weak, loose , and does not stand well . My sisters is better quality and can feel how sturdy it would stand . Disappointed I wasted my money . It does stick to car magnetic holder but that’s about what it functions for me .
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for about five months. After that it becomes loose, then within a couple months it breaks completely. I've gotten two, same with both. Customer Service is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: I actually really enjoyed it when I first got it. The quality was good and it comes with an applicator you place first so you don’t attach it directly to your phone or case to easily remove which is nice. The ring also swivels so you can hold it vertically or horizontally. However, I bought this in November and it didn’t last long at all. It broke a month later. The ring no longer stays in place so there’s really no point in me using it. I wouldn’t recommend this product for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I've had it for almost a month now and it's been great! Works awesome with the vent holder I purchased for my vehicle to hold my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Blindt

customer_reviews.title: Holds amazingly!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this SAME ring stand on 4 different phone cases and it remains stuck to the current (fourth) case like a charm! I hold it by the ring and trust that it won’t come off completely. This thing is truly amazing. So glad I bought it! My only regret is buying only 1. I’ve had it for a year now and I think I might get another only because I plan on getting another case and don’t want to have to move it back and forth. All in all I wish I could give it 100 stars!
customer_reviews.author: jcierrac

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the fact that the ring itself moves on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously - a must have now that I own one. Makes seeing your phone easier when texting or reading. I stuck my ring stand onto brand new phone case, pressed for 2 minutes and its firmly on. I especially like the fact that the ring itself moves on the base 360 degrees - can make phone stand vertical and horizontal. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive, long lasting, pretty color, multifunctional.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Has not required resecuring. Been a year. Still sticking as strong as day 1. Very convenient as movie stand or for secure holding in public. Looks nice too. Of course, never apply adhesives to dusty surfaces. Always use rubbing alcohol to clean surfaces before sticking things on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sarakul

customer_reviews.title: Very secure and easy to place
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ring, enjoy more than a pop socket. You get the advantage of having the magnet as well as the ring. The adhesive is VERY secure, and comes with extra adhesive. Not the easiest to remove from a case so make sure to double check before u stick.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and there’s no way I’d be able to hold my 8 plus without this. It’s so much nicer looking than a pop socket and I also like how it feels better. It’s sturdy and the rose gold is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy this again. Its great. Very durable and I love rose gold which is its color perfectly. It comes with stickers to reapply for future use so you have many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Pippa

customer_reviews.title: The magnet works great. The ring though, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the magnet on the ring. It comes in super handy. With that said, I've had it for just about 2 months and the ring is getting progressively more loose every day. The ring still works and does it's purpose but I'm not sure how much longer it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Frames64

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Ring works great & looks very stylish. I had a popsocket for a day & hated it. I like that this can be almost flat to the phone. My only complaint is the white sticker with the name on got dirty really fast but what do you expect with white?
customer_reviews.author: amp140

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet! Will not bump off from car's cell mount easily!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't review things right away, figuring that I really want to get a feel of how the product performs over some measure of time, but this -- WOW! I am so impressed with just how strongly the magnet holds onto my chosen cell mount for my vehicle (GO-XT, bought from O'Reilly Auto Parts). Guess I'll have to come back to rate the longevity of the product, but I think I remember song that the company stands firmly behind their product. Based on that, I'll be okay for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetLover

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!!!!! I dislike pop sockets (personal preference) and prefer ring stands so this worked out. I use it at my desk to prop up my phone when watching videos and for when I walk around. *****I dropped my phone from my work locker once (hard/tall drop) and the stand popped off. I didn’t clean the phone/adhesive area- I just popped it back on and and it’s still going strong three months later. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K

product_meta.title: Humixx Phone Ring Holder, Stainless Steel Cell Phone Finger Stand, 360° Rotation Thin Universal Kickstand, Magnetic Car Mount for iPhone XR/XS Max, Samsung S10, Huawei P30 - Rose Gold
feature_bullets: 💍[Humix Ring Unique Desing for Long Lasting]: Humixx phone ring use the high-quality zinc alloy and stainless steel, zinc alloy has good ductility, avoid breaking it when fall down, stainless steel is sturdy and holds the ring firmly, help it become a long-term good stand. High quality 4 layers coating perfectly keeps the original Rose Gold color and prevent it from fading away.

💍[Sturdy Sticker for 5 KG Max]: Humixx phone ring uses top tier sticky 3M pressure sensitive adhesive, enhancing the adsorption force, prevent your device from accidental drops, slips. while without any remains once you want to take if off from your phone. Note: Please do not use the phone ring kickstand within 24 hours after installation.

💍[Widely Compability Ring Holder]: Humixx finger ring stand can be applied to all smartphone in 4-8 inches, like iPhone11 11Pro 11 Max XS Max XR X 8 8 plus 7 7 plus 6 6 plus 5 5s 5c se, Huawei, Samsung Note 10 S10+ S10 LG Google Etc. (Cannot be used for wireless charging.), iPad tablet, convenient for your life. It provides you 360°rotation different viewing angle and 180°rotation foldable using. Specifically designed for you to set hands free when holding your phone or using on a flat surface.

💍[Humanized Ergonomic Design]: It is convenient to work with a magnetic holder when driving. Also, It is easily to grip phone when you are taking a cup, Ring holder takes your phones stand well on desk, so that you can enjoying watching videos, listening to music, or playing games. The smooth edge, no worries for finger harm.

💍[NO Hassle Phone Ring]: Humixx Phone Ring Stand provides you with quality products with excellent customer service, we want to give back to you by giving you the opportunity to register your product and receive a 18-Months.
